text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Fortnite. The build quality of the Refurbished: Lenovo Y50 15.6" Full HD Gaming Laptop with Quad Core i7-4710HQ 2.50GHz (3.50GHz Turbo), 16GB Memory, 1TB HDD + 8GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 4GB, JBL Speakers, Windows 8.1 64-Bit is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the Refurbished: Lenovo Y50 15.6" Full HD Gaming Laptop with Quad Core i7-4710HQ 2.50GHz (3.50GHz Turbo), 16GB Memory, 1TB HDD + 8GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 4GB, JBL Speakers, Windows 8.1 64-Bit is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 860 in the Refurbished: Lenovo Y50 15.6" Full HD Gaming Laptop with Quad Core i7-4710HQ 2.50GHz (3.50GHz Turbo), 16GB Memory, 1TB HDD + 8GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 4GB, JBL Speakers, Windows 8.1 64-Bit is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

The Refurbished: Lenovo Y50 15.6" Full HD Gaming Laptop with Quad Core i7-4710HQ 2.50GHz (3.50GHz Turbo), 16GB Memory, 1TB HDD + 8GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 4GB, JBL Speakers, Windows 8.1 64-Bit does what it says on the tin. Good for content creation and gaming, but the screen brightness could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA GTX 860 in the Refurbished: Lenovo Y50 15.6" Full HD Gaming Laptop with Quad Core i7-4710HQ 2.50GHz (3.50GHz Turbo), 16GB Memory, 1TB HDD + 8GB SSD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 4GB, JBL Speakers, Windows 8.1 64-Bit is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
